name: The Other Side (ImZary)
description:
This game is a geo jam submission, hope you like it :D

Controlls : 

-A or D, or the Left & right arrow keys to move

-Space to jump(in the black player)or change gravity(in the white player)

& that's pretty much it ! Good Luck :D

NOTE : this game is hard, not that hard, but it is not the easiest game you ever played
